ygData.subject: RE: I can't Screech
ygData.msgSnippet: You don t have to be in combat... you don t have to be in PvP, or in a PvP area .  The graphic doesn t have to play, etc, etc. First and foremost : Make sure
ygData.messageBody:
You don't have to be in combat... you don't have to be in PvP, or in a PvP
"area". The graphic doesn't have to play, etc, etc.

First and foremost : Make sure you have at least 1 point of skill already
trained in it. I personally dumped 20 or so, when I first got it. Next,
find yourself a secluded area in any zone anywhere and fire it up. It takes
a LONG time for it to go up. It took me roughly 3 hours to go from 52 skill
to 94 skill. I practice it whenever the opportunity arises... on the boat,
when people are medding/resting and you're in a area that's safe to use it,
etc etc.

Another point, I do _think_ that the skill will go up faster while in
combat. I started using "full instrument" against faeries in Lesser Faydark
and my skill is up around 125 now.

Hope this helps

Desmei Sightblinder
Lvl 30 Bard (Povar)

> -----Original Message-----
> From: JasonF [mailto:JasonF@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, October 13, 1999 9:36 AM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: [eqbards] I can't Screech
>
>
> From: "JasonF" <JasonF@...>
>
>
> I'm Crier Sharpsong, a 26th half-elf Bard on Fennin Ro.
>
> I've been having a recurring problem getting my Brass skill
> up and would
> like to ask people here about it. I've read time and again
> that I should
> venture to Arena or a PvP area, start Denon's Disruptive
> Discord and leave
> it running indefinitely to increase my skill. However, I
> have not been
> successful in getting that to work. Initially I went to
> Arena in Rathe Mts.
> and tried this. I had read that you only needed to be in the
> area, not
> actually in the PvP area itself, so I equipped my Minotaur
> Horn, fired up,
> fired up, fired up, fired up, fired up, fired up, fired up,
> fired up, DDD
> and went to a restaurant for dinner. Before I left I noticed that the
> "plays horn" graphic wasn't running, but didn't think much
> about it. Got
> back from dinner to find zero skill increase. Hmm.. Ok,
> perhaps I *do*
> have to be in the PvP area, so I tried that. Same results.
> Ok, maybe it's
> the Minotaur Horn - maybe it's the problem. So the next time
> I was in the
> bank and thought about it, I traded out my Minotaur Horn
> (tired of the bag
> in my wrist anyhow) for a standard store-bought horn. Last
> night I tried
> practicing this song in the PvP area of Freeport and it again wouldn't
> actually play. Well now I have gone to Kelethin and bought
> Screech and am
> completely unable to start the song due to my brass skill. I
> tried to start
> Screech (literally) about 300 times last night with and
> without the horn
> equipped and had *one* success - not too useful.
>
> When there is not a mob within range of my song, what I get
> is DDD starts, I
> briefly get some orange flares from my hands and then it's
> just me standing
> there. No playing horn graphic, no orange flares, nothing.
>
> Can anyone comment on this and/or offer a solution? I *need*
> this song, but
> if Verant has changed it so that the only way for me to
> increase my Brass
> skill is to fight experience-giving mobs with it, I'm
> screwed. I *WILL* die
> trying to get DDD and/or Screech fired up against a blue mob.
>
> Crier Sharpsong - 26th on Fennin Ro
>
